name: Emergency Escape (Neon Glass)
description:
Description

Year 20XX. Humans have been exploring the space for some time now, and, after meeting some friendly aliens, started building space stations in outer space.

This is a story of one such station, or, to be more specific, of its final moments.

Instructions
  • Interact with various objects on the station to prepare resources for the pod.
  • You can't interact with broken objects (with red HP bars).
  • Fix objects by interacting with them while holding a repair kit.
  • To prepare the pod you need to supply it with 5 food, fuel, and oxygen. Energy charges over time.
  • You can return the unneeded items back to stations.
  • Every character has their own strength!
  • Try to evacuate as many characters as possible!
Controls
  • WASD/Arrows: Move camera around.
  • Middle mouse button: Move camera around. (Standalone only)
  • Mouse wheel: Zoom in/out.
  • Spacebar: Center camera on the station.
  • LMB: Select a character.
  • RMB: Command a character.
  • P: Pause.
Characters

   Captain - does nothing useful

 Cook - prepares food faster than others

   Engineer - acquires fuel and oxygen tanks faster than others

  Mechanic - repairs stuff faster than others

 Loader - can carry two objects at the same time
